title: The all in one solution for local development
description:
Restarting PHP is a thing of the past with multi-PHP versions.
Find bliss with a pre-configured development environment, automatic DNS resolution, ssl certificates, aliases and much more!test

featureList.title: Auto DNS
featureList.description: Creating a new project just requires you to create a new folder on the filesystem. No more messing with your hosts file every time.

featureList.title: Multiple PHP versions
featureList.description: From 5.6 - 8.0, they all run at once, no more restarting or rebuilding.

featureList.title: Pre-configured databases
featureList.description: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, and Memcached; all included with sane default configs, yet highly flexible when needed.

featureList.title: Powerful workspace
featureList.description: Equipped with Oh My ZSH and many shortcut commands; type less, do more.

featureList.title: NodeJS, npm with nvm
featureList.description: NVM installed by default. Get setup an going within minutes.

featureList.title: SMTP with email
featureList.description: Catch your development emails with the builtin SMTP mail server, and view them easily with webmail.

section1.description:
Install within minutes, and get going FAST.  
Easy to setup multiple machines and have everyone on the same page. Compatible with Linux, Windows*, and macOS.

\*Works best on windows with WSL 2.
section1.title:
Develop more,
configure less
